description:
The fifth member of the Planetary Gears is the idol Ai.  She and her Machine Goodfellow Hebihanabi are a fierce match for Daichi`s group.  Meanwhile, Amarock kidnaps Akari to make her use her hacking to shut off all the low orbit impactors.  Akari uses her final trump card, and threatens to use all the world`s nuclear weapons to annihilate humanity.  Amarock fears the loss of his food, and is forced to release Akari.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魔法少女アカリちゃん
